title: Peace n Loaf
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Western, Fast food
description: A pizzeria that does not use foam or plastics for carry out food; you bring your own container or eat in place. The dough is made in-house without oil or sugar, using local, fresh ingredients when possible. Offers a vegan cheese of local vegetables and agar agar. The the magic salad is made of greens, mushroom, toasted hemp seeds, Bragg's, and a Caribbean dressing.
